name: Sing AR Fight
description:
When you have some time to relax, wait for a cup of coffee or just feel bored you can plunge yourself into fantastic Augmented Reality. Transform the surface around you into a magical song contest where the ultra realistic gnomes fight for primacy.

Features:
• all new ways to play game in immersive Augmented Reality;
• stunning 3D graphics and animations;
• power-ups (some of them will help you, others can make your game more difficult);
• different characters and location sets are coming soon…

Download Sing AR Fight today and get guaranteed fun!
